name: Stranded (itch) (MakeShift)
description:
>At approximately 2300 hours last night the generators aboard the TITAN passenger cruiser failed.

>This caused the leakage of a virus that was being taken to the planet Delta 2 for study.

>There are no known survivors.

This is a short 4 level environmental puzzle game in which you wake up and find yourself alone. On each level more is revealed about where you are and where everyone else is.
